original_text: Ish-Bosheth did not dare to say another word to Abner, because he was afraid of him.
korean_text: 이스보셋이 아브넬을 두려워하여 감히 한 마디도 대답하지 못하니라

sentences.original_text: Ish-Bosheth did not dare to say another word
sentences.korean_translation: 이스보셋은 감히 다른 말을 하지 못했다

sentences.original_text: because he was afraid of him
